Game play is good, but the monetisation for this absolute garbage fire of a game is complete ASS, the battle pass is probably the most scummy and worst one in gaming. and the fact that the PVE has turned into this is awful, and there are only two new missions as the Rio mission was finished in 2019. WTF!!!

Devs are insane if they think what they did to OW1, now OW2, was the best decision they could've done.
ĞºÑƒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ½Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ - ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ÑˆĞµĞ». Ğ‘Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ·Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´ Ğ°Ñƒ, Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¾ ĞºÑ€ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğº ÑĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ, Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ñ€ÑƒÑÑ‹ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´ĞµĞ½ÑŒÑ‚Ğµ.

OW2 on Steam? Disgusting, blatant cash grab.

After neglecting (initially really fun game, promising to be the next great brand) the original OW to death and forcing players to switch to OW2 (yes, it is not possible to play original anymore) everything went downhill.
Oh, and just to remind and highlight the fact: the original OW was a full-price game; after enjoying it with my family and friends since 2016 all we got in OW was some lousy badges and an access to one new character.

Anticipated story mode? Straight to the bin, there wasn't even an attempt to implement it.

"Free to play" model? That's just an excuse to rake in skins and other cosmetics money from not-knowing-any-better players (previously, obtainable for free - loot boxes mechanics might have been a tiresome, random grind, but hey - those are just cosmetics, in the end).

New characters introduced periodically? Well, that is one thing they kept to, but still - they put a paywall in front of it (battle pass, season pass or whatever they call it).


In conclusion: after hundreds of enjoyable hours spent in the original OW, but with OW2 I am just disappointed in how they treated the player base and the game itself. That is all.

Worse in every aspect to Overwatch 1, no integrated group finder option, no off tank, no fun, the new heroes feel off / uninspiried, shameless cash grab, new heroes have to be unlocked, new players only get like 5 heroes to play (lmao), the absolutely worst matchmaking in any game I've played, rank placements are useless and way worse than SR from OW1. I can keep going, but damn this game sucks balls, theres no team work in this game, EMP-Shatter, Grav-Dragon, it just never happens anymore, Overwatch 1 in late 2020 (no updates for years) was in a better spot than this fucking dissapointment. But what could be expected, when they revealed that Overwatch 1 was going to be removed after they launched this turd title, rip buddy.

After playing the game for 6 years I can finally talk about it. 
You were one of the first games I've bought and played for hours and hours. My pc at that time couldn't even open you at 30 fps but no matter what, I was having a blast. 
But you ruined this beatiful game thanks to your greed and useless pride. With every step you took you  sinked lower and lower while everyone waited you to rise with hope. You sh*tted on PvE and League, you ruined what was Overwatch and changed it to a money machine that has no respect to its customers. Developers made some bad changes but it can be changed. We still have hope, but for you Blizzard? I hope you sell yourself like the wh*re you are and rot in debt.
